question: The Amendment Bill which is passed in Rajya Sabha is?
option1: Indian Institute of Information Technology Public Private Partnership (IIIT-PPP) Bill
option2: The Union Territory and service Bill
answer: Indian Institute of Information Technology Public Private Partnership (IIIT-PPP) Bill
explanation: Rajya Sabha passed the Indian Institute of Information Technology Public Private Partnership (IIIT-PPP) Bill 2017. It will also grant statutory status to the fifteen IIITs established in PPP mode and declare them Institutes of National Importance.
